title: Wall-d
extended_details:
Wall-e, just an earlier version. Also, he doesn't compact trash. Yet.

The plan:
A miniature replica of Wall-e that can roll around and move his arms/eyes. Most of the machinery will be contained within his body, hence the inability to compact trash.

We plan to make Wall-d capable of object detection so that he can be expressive in his human-robot and plant-robot interactions.
